title: Faster reporting on FixMyStreet: start your report with a photo
content: A new feature has been released for FixMyStreet giving users the option to start their reports with a photo, the data from which can be extracted to speed up the reporting process. As well as making the reporting process quicker, this new functionality should also increase the accuracy of reports, removing the need for users who can’t or don’t want to report the problem at its location to remember exactly where it was at a later point in time. Photo-first reporting is available on both desktop a...
creator: Sally Bracegirdle
sourceDescription: mySociety provides technology, research and data to help people be active citizens, in more than 40 countries around the world.
